tasks.task: Follow the tractor's route and inspect the fields.
subtasks: Sit on the tractor and drive it.
Observe the fields from the tractor's cab.
Check for any crop damage or pests.
Note areas that need additional attention.

tasks.task: Operate the cultivator attached to the tractor.
subtasks: Attach the cultivator to the tractor.
Lower the cultivator to the ground.
Activate the cultivator and begin working the soil.
Adjust the depth of the cultivator as needed.
Monitor the soil being turned over.

tasks.task: Check the water levels in the irrigation system.
subtasks: Walk along the irrigation system to examine each part.
Check for leaks or damaged pipe sections.
Open valves to check water flow to various areas.
Close valves after checking to prevent water loss.
Attach the spreader to the tractor.
Drive the tractor over the fields while operating the spreader.
Adjust the spread pattern as needed.
